main event: On August 30, 1968, a glowing unidentified object was observed in Hamilton, Ohio for about 40 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially mistaken for a satellite or a jet trail,The object displayed unusual movement, moving down and to the right with a high estimated speed of 3000 mph,The observer attempted to identify the object's nature but could not determine its course,The object disappeared after an observation period of at least 8-10 minutes,The report did not include any photographs.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. who initially reported the sighting to the Air Force.
